content: fugly monster version 5 - otis 5mm hook worsted weight yarn in three contrasting colors main scales & inner mouth white or color of choice for horns sport weight in white for teeth safety eyes and nose or you can crochet or stitch them on game controller is available separately microphone can be found at the end of the main pattern worked in the round top down head/body - 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 7 increase single_crochet 5 around 42 8 increase single_crochet 6 around 48 9 hdcinc x3 single_crochet 21 hdcinc x3 single_crochet 21 54 10 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 21 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet 21 54 11-13 single_crochet around 3r of 54 14 single_crochet 12 chain 12 skip 12 single_crochet 30 54 15 single_crochet 12 single_crochet 12 single_crochet 30 54 16 decrease single_crochet 7 around 48 stop here - eyes go between rounds 9 & 10 above ends of mouth nose is centered just below the eyes inner mouth - contrast color - 1 chain 15 turn single_crochet 14 2-4 chain 1 turn single_crochet 14 - fo leave long tail for sewing sew to inside of head over mouth hole teeth - 4mm hook - make 5 1 chain 4 turn slip_stitch 3 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 3 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 3 - fo leave tail for sewing sew to inner mouth then continue with main pattern 17 decrease single_crochet 6 around 42 18 decrease single_crochet 5 around 36 19 decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 20 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 21 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 22 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 stuff head 23 single_crochet around 24 24 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 25-27 single_crochet around 30 28 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 29-31 single_crochet around 36 32 increase single_crochet 5 around 42 33-36 single_crochet around 4r of 42 37 decrease single_crochet 5 around 36 stop here - move st marker back one st this now becomes st #1 of leg #1 38 single_crochet 16 this will make 18 single_crochet for this round 39 working across body single_crochet into first st with marker and next 17 18 40-49 single_crochet around 10r of 18 50 decrease single_crochet around 12 51 decrease around 6 fo close hole stuff body & leg one leg #2 - attach with a slip_stitch to first open st on front to left of leg 1 1 chain 1 single_crochet into same st & next 17 18 2 single_crochet into first st & next 17 18 3-12 single_crochet around 10r of 18 13 decrease single_crochet around 12 14 decrease around 6 fo close hole stuff leg & rest of body through hole between legs close hole between legs tuck tails inside body arms - make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 4 increase single_crochet 4 around 18 5-7
